get.description: Lists available clients for processing collection events

parameters.description: Sort by column. Can be used multiple times; prepend hyphen for descending order. Sortable columns are name, ip_address, hostname, configured_user, last_checkin, completed_job_count, id, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at.
parameters.name: sort_by

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq
parameters.name: ip_address

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq
parameters.name: version

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq
parameters.name: user_sid

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq, gt, gte, lt, lte
parameters.name: last_checkin

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq, gt, gte, lt, lte
parameters.name: current_job_id

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq, gt, gte, lt, lte

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq

parameters.name: created_at

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq, gt, gte, lt, lte
parameters.name: updated_at

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq, gt, gte, lt, lte
parameters.name: deleted_at

parameters.description: Valid values are `true` or `false` and defaults to `true`. When a value of `true` is passed, any domains associated with scheduled and finished jobs for each client will have expanded properties including `name` and `type`. When a value of `false` is passed, these same domains will only return as a list of `objectid`s.
parameters.name: hydrate_domains

parameters.description: Valid values are `true` or `false` and defaults to `true`. When a value of `true` is passed, any OUs associated with scheduled and finished jobs for each client will have expanded properties including `name` and `type`. When a value of `false` is passed, these same OUs will only return as a list of `objectid`s.
parameters.name: hydrate_ous

post.description: Creates a client for collection events

requestBody.description: The request body for creating a client
The request body for logging a client enumeration error

put.description: Endpoint for clients to update their own information at startup. Note: caller must be a client. For users, this endpoint will return a 404 as they are not expected or allowed to call this endpoint.

requestBody.description: The request body for updating a client

parameters.description: Client ID
parameters.name: client_id
